## Introduction

This vignette demonstrates how to use the `assignment4bsingh` package for data analysis and visualization.

## Installation

```{r, eval = FALSE}
remotes::install_github("BhaviSinghC/assignment-4-packages-and-shiny-apps-BhaviSinghC")
```

## Basic Usage

```{r}
library(assignment4bsingh)
hello()
```

## Running the Shiny App

```{r, eval = FALSE}
run_app()
```

## Conclusion

This package provides tools for data analysis and interactive visualization through a Shiny interface.
